title: Home Page
text: Transfer Your Balances and Save When you transfer your balances to a Cedar Point credit card, you can consolidate debt, save on monthly payments and potentially pay off your debt sooner. Plus, there are no transfer fees. Banking & Investments Use our digital banking app to monitor and manage your accounts on the go. Cards & Loans Our knowledgeable professionals are here to help you with your borrowing needs. Member Benefits Learning Center We’re committed to providing financial education for all ages About Cedar Point When you transfer your balances to a Cedar Point credit card, you can consolidate debt, save on monthly payments and potentially pay off your debt sooner. Plus, there are no transfer fees. 2025 marked Cedar Point Federal Credit Union's® 80th anniversary! To mark the milestone, we launched our “80 Acts of Service" initiative, with the goal of giving back to the community we have been serving since 1945. Enjoy a $10 Extraordinary Dividend! To celebrate what a great year we have had, we're awarding a second extraordinary dividend, totaling nearly $405,000, to primary savings accounts in good standing. Maryland Tax-free week was August 10 through 16 this year. Learn more about qualifying items and be prepared for this time next year! Cedar Point and Cedar Point Financial Services, Inc. offer 10 scholarships to graduating seniors residing in Calvert, Charles, and St. Mary’s counties. We aim to protect our members from fraud by educating them on the latest fraud schemes and how to combat them. Learn the red flag of Smishing.
